Marc Ribot y Los Cubanos Postizos - Muy Divertido! (Very Entertaining!) (2000)
            EAC rip (secure mode) | FLAC (tracks)+CUE+LOG -> 250 Mb
                     Full Artwork @ 600 dpi (png) -> 27 Mb



Regrouping his Latin backing band Los Cubanos Postizos, Marc Ribot offers a sequel to his 1998 Arsenio Rodriguez tribute The Prosthetic Cubans in Muy Divertido! ("very entertaining"). 

While there are once again a few songs penned by Rodriguez, there's also a greater variety of composers represented, including three Ribot originals. Ribot's angular, visceral guitar style adds rock drive and avant-garde edge to these deep Latin grooves, and Anthony Coleman's spacy organ work adds a playfully strange texture to some tracks.
